step_feedback.feedback: For rep 1, your shoulder movement was a bit wide. For rep 2, your shoulder movement was much better, but try to keep your elbows a little closer to your body.
For rep 1, your shoulder blades moved well. For rep 2, your shoulder blades moved nicely, but try to keep your wrists a little straighter.
For rep 1, your shoulder movement was good, but try to keep your wrists a bit straighter. For rep 2, your shoulder movement was good, but try to keep your wrists a little straighter.

exercise_summary: Great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter and your elbows closer to your body for even better results.
